name: Break The Heart
description:
This is an extremely simplistic game about flying through a randomly-generated train of boxes and cubes, to reach and destroy the Heart. This is done by flying straight into it. There are pickups littered throughout, though they often hinder more than help.

Controls
  • Q-R: pan left & right
  • Mouse Up-Mouse Down: pitch up & down
  • Mouse Left-Mouse Right: roll left & right
